title: Company Directory App
headline: an adaptive platform built using React.js and Flask
searchDescription: An adaptive platform built using React.js and Flask
longDescription: The Company Directory App is an adaptive platform built using React.js and Flask, designed for seamless user interaction. It integrates RESTful APIs to manage data efficiently with MongoDB, ensuring smooth CRUD operations. With Axios and CORS, the app handles secure HTTP requests and manages cross-origin communication, providing a responsive and secure experience for users.

title: Flight Finder
headline: Easily search and compare flight prices
searchDescription: Find the best flight prices for one-way and round trips
longDescription: Flight Finder is a web application that allows users to search for flight prices from their origin to destination. It supports both one-way and round-trip searches, providing accurate fare details for different routes. The app features a seamless authentication system powered by Clerk, ensuring secure user sessions. Built with React for the frontend and Express.js for the backend, it delivers a smooth and responsive experience for travelers looking to compare and book flights effortlessly.

title: Role-Based Access Control
headline: A place to manage your employee
searchDescription: A secure and intuitive platform for managing users, roles, and permissions with dynamic access control.
longDescription: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Application is a robust platform designed to streamline user and role management while enhancing security and operational efficiency. Built with React.js, Redux, and Axios for the frontend, and optionally powered by Node.js and Express.js for backend API simulation, this application enables seamless CRUD operations on users, roles, and permissions. Featuring JWT-based authentication, it ensures secure sessions and precise access control. With its intuitive UI, administrators can dynamically assign roles, manage permissions, and simulate API calls, making it an essential tool for scalable and flexible access management systems.

title: Drive App
headline: Effortlessly create, edit, and save letters to Google Drive
searchDescription: Create and manage letters with Google Drive integration
longDescription: Drive App is a full-stack web application that enables users to sign up and log in using Google authentication, create and edit text-based letters, and save them directly to their Google Drive as Google Docs files. It features a simple text editor for letter creation, secure JWT-based session management, and an intuitive letter management system that provides easy access to saved documents with direct Google Drive links. Built with modern web technologies, the app ensures a smooth and efficient document management experience.

title: SnapSizzle
headline: From SnapSizzle You can send snaps very easily
longDescription: SnapSizzle is a dynamic snap application built with Next.js, offering user-to-user messaging with text and photos. It features media sharing for seamless snap exchanges and real-time notifications to keep users updated on new messages and snaps. The app is designed for efficient performance with server-side rendering, providing an engaging and responsive user experience.

title: ChatSpark
headline: ChatSpark is a real time chat application where people can talk to each other and make friends.
searchDescription: You can communicate with your loved ones
longDescription: ChatSpark is a real-time chat platform built with the MERN stack, Socket.io, and Material UI. It offers seamless instant messaging, multimedia sharing, and real-time online status updates. The application is designed to handle high traffic, providing a smooth and responsive user experience through a reliable and scalable communication system.

title: SmartGenie - AI
headline: SmartGenie is an innovative AI platform redefining intelligence and automation.
searchDescription: From SmartGenie You can generate realistic images and summarize any website and also ask your doubts from smartgenie chatbot
longDescription: SmartGenie a comprehensive full-stack AI SaaS platform using React and Express, designed to provide seamless AI-powered solutions for image generation, website summarization, and automated video creation. Integrated a real-time AI chatbot that allows users to ask questions instantly, alongside an intelligent web scraping and summarization system that efficiently transforms web content into concise summaries. Implemented an advanced short video creation feature with audio narration using FFMPEG.
